column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Without a doubt get the bacon wrapped dates
column2: they're to die for. Short Rib and burrata were very good but not amazing. Spicy potatoes were also excellent. It was the perfect amount of food and came to about $30 a piece after tax and tip- which was well worth it and we were all full! We sat out on the covered patio which was awesome
column3: and I was surprised how full it got on a Wednesday evening! Excited to go back and try more menu items!!
